moves.2. Nf3: i attack and get ready to castle
moves.2... Nf6: look like he is copying me
moves.4. Bc4: i get ready to attack f7
moves.4... Bc5: he does the same for f2
moves.5... Kf8: i don't request computer analysis, but moving the queen would of been better

moves.7... h5: blunder in my opinion... he should of moved castle
moves.8. Nxh8: and so black has lost two pawns, queen and castle for a mere white pawn....
moves.8... a5: i don't quite know what black is doing, but i have a plan
moves.9... Kf8: he moves there, should of moved to e7 so he could escape d6 way
moves.10. Qf7#: which gives me checkmate.... hope you enjoyed. feel free to comment as i read all your comments and take it on board.... i enjoyed this short game and i always try and start a quick players only game.... feel free to join
